text: Pyotr Fyodorovich Lysenko (, ; 16 September 1931 â€“ 23 March 2020) was a Belarusian archaeologist. He was the author of over 110 scientific works, including many monographs. He is also known for opening the Berestye Archeological Museum in Brest. Lysenko died on 23 March 2020 in Minsk. He was 88. ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Archaeologists Category:Belarusian people
title: Pyotr Lysenko
